name: Demon Scrolls
description:
Wayland is sent from the west to try and help the town of Vormon with their goblin problem.
Before he knows it he is wrapped up in a much larger conflict.
A powerful wizard called the Primagen is attempting to piece together ancient scrolls
to summon a demon into the world. Join Wayland in his journey to stop the Primagen,
before the world is doomed.

Demon Scrolls is not attempting to reinvent the wheel.
This is a classic story with classic gameplay.
The game is straight forward and easy to comprehend.
If you enjoy killing monsters and finding treasure then this game
could be a good fit for you.
Players can expect over 20 hours of gameplay.
(Single Player RPG)
